2.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage and grants you one stack of the "Concentration" effect at a 20% chance.
If the "Concentration" effect was not received, the chance of receiving the "Concentration" effect with the next use of "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis", Psychic "Shock" or "Astral Venom" increases by 20%.
Psychic "Shock" shares cooldown with Erase Memory, "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis" and "Astral Venom" abilities.
2.name: Psychic_Shock
2.title: Psychic Shock

4.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEstablishes a Mental Link with the target.
Mental Link is required for casting certain spells.
Damage you inflict to the Mental Link target is increased by 20%.
4.name: Psionicist's_Mental_Link
4.title: Psionicist's Mental Link

6.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage to the target.
* Consumes one stack of the "Concentration" effect.*
Pain Transfer and "Destabilization" share a cooldown.
6.name: Shock
6.title: Shock

7.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Fire damage and grants you one stack of the "Concentration" effect at a 20% chance.
If the "Concentration" effect was not received, you will inflict additional !e2 Fire damage, and the chance of receiving the "Concentration" effect with the next use of Pyrokinesis, "Pyrolysis", "Psychic "Shock"" or "Astral Venom" increases by 20%.
7.name: Pyrokinesis
7.title: Pyrokinesis

8.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a twin of yours for 30 seconds, moves you 15 yards away in a random direction and turns you invisible to the target of the spell.
The enemy receives a Mental Resistance effect which makes them immune to a repeated application of the spell.
The twin mimics you, but receives !e1 times more damage.
Requires a Mental Link.
8.name: Twin
8.title: Twin

9.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInstantly grants you 2 stacks of the Concentration effect.
9.name: Concentration
9.title: Concentration

10.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dTransforms into Ectoplasmatic Form for !e1 seconds, absorbing !e2 damage.
10.name: Ectoplasmatic_Form
10.title: Ectoplasmatic Form

11.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHypnotizes the target for !e1 seconds, plunging them into a stupor.
Requires Mental Link or "Will Suppression" effect.
11.name: Hypnosis
11.title: Hypnosis

12.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage, knocking all enemies back !e2 yards from you and stunning them for !e3 seconds.
12.name: Mental_Pulse
12.title: Mental Pulse

13.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage to the target every 2 seconds for 8 seconds and slows their movement by 50%.
*Consumes one stack of the "Concentration" effect.*
13.name: Choke
13.title: Choke

14.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals you for !e1 plus additional !e2 every 2 seconds for 10 seconds and dispels one negative Poison, Disease and bleeding effect from you.
14.name: Mental_Cleansing
14.title: Mental Cleansing

15.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCreates a gravitational anomaly on the surface of the ground, drawing all enemies within a 10 yard radius to it.
All affected targets will be knocked down and receive immunity to Telekinetic Pull for 20 seconds.
15.name: Telekinetic_Pull
15.title: Telekinetic Pull

16.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCreates a vortex of weapons surrounding the enemy target, which lasts 5 seconds and inflicts !e1 physical damage per second to all enemies within a 10 yard radius of the target.
This damage is not increased by the established Mental Link.
16.name: Wall_of_Blades
16.title: Wall of Blades

17.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases maximum health, mana and energy of all party members by !e1%You cannot use Seal of Health and "Aura of Astral Power "at the same time
17.name: Seal_of_Health
17.title: Seal of Health

18.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases your speed of thought by 15 seconds, but you lose the ability of accumulating "Concentration" effects.
Decreases the cast time of "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis" and "Wall of Blades" abilities by 50%.
Decreases cooldowns of "Psychic "Shock"", "Astral Venom" and Erase Memory abilities by 50%.
Increases your movement speed by 50%.
18.name: Temporal_Acceleration
18.title: Temporal Acceleration

19.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a spectral copy of the target for !e1 seconds which attacks its prototype.
The Spectral Assassin receives 300% additional damage, but only the prototype can attack it.
* Consumes 2 stacks of the "Concentration" effect.*
19.name: Phantasmal_Killer
19.title: Phantasmal Killer

20.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSuppresses the will of the target.
Duration of control effects applied to the target under the Will Suppression effect is increased by 20%.
20.name: Will_Suppression
20.title: Will Suppression

21.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage and grants you one stack of the "Concentration" effect at a 20% chance.
If the "Concentration" effect was not received, the chance of receiving the "Concentration" effect with the next use of "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis", "Psychic "Shock"" or Astral Venom increases by 20%.
Astral Venom shares cooldown with Erase Memory, "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis" and "Psychic "Shock"" abilities.
21.name: Astral_Venom
21.title: Astral Venom

22.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Fire damage and grants you one stack of the "Concentration" effect at a 20% chance.
If the "Concentration" effect was not received, you will inflict additional !e2 Fire damage, and the chance of receiving the "Concentration" effect with the next use of "Pyrokinesis", Pyrolysis, "Psychic "Shock"" or "Astral Venom" increases by 20%.
22.name: Pyrolysis
22.title: Pyrolysis

23.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dTransforms into "Ectoplasmatic Form" for !e1 seconds, absorbing !e2 damage.
"Ectoplasmatic Form" and Ectoplasmatic Body share a cooldown.
23.name: Astral_Body
23.title: Astral Body

24.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage to the target.
* Consumes one stack of the "Concentration" effect.*
Pain Transfer and Destabilization share a cooldown.
24.name: Destabilization
24.title: Destabilization

25.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage to all enemies within a 25 yard radius every 2 seconds and decreases movement speed by 50%.
Duration: 8 seconds.
*Consumes 1 stack of the "Concentration" effects after use.*
*Consumes 3 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragons of a higher quality increases the damage dealt.
25.name: Astral_Breath
25.title: Astral Breath

26.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Astral damage to a target.
*Consumes 1 stack of the Thoughtful Spirit effect.*
Every 20 seconds an additional stack of the Thoughtful Spirit is generated, up to 5 stacks.
*Consumes 1 Tear of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragons of a higher quality increases the damage dealt.
26.name: Thoughtful_Spirit
26.title: Thoughtful Spirit

27.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases cooldowns of the next 3 abilities used by target up to 20 seconds.
Lasts 30 seconds.
27.name: Mind_Fire
27.title: Mind Fire

28.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Will Suppression" ability immobilizes the opponent for 2 seconds.
28.name: Sharp_Incursion
28.title: Sharp Incursion

29.body:
!lvl !cost !d!e1% of damage you receive transfers to your "Twin", if summoned.
Damage received by "Twin" increases by 100%.
"Twin"'s stats do not affect this damage.
29.name: Master_of_Illusions
29.title: Master of Illusions

30.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases healing done by your "Mental Cleansing" ability and damage absorbed by your "Ectoplasmatic Form" and Ectoplasmatic Body by !e1%.
30.name: Egoism
30.title: Egoism

31.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your Erase Memory and Mental Explosion spells by !e1%.
31.name: Mental_Crisis
31.title: Mental Crisis

33.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Choke" spell by !e1% and its range by !e2 yards.
33.name: Tenacious_Mind
33.title: Tenacious Mind

36.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 50%.
Spells you cast increase magic damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effect
36.name: Aura_of_Astral_Power_
36.title: Aura of Astral Power

37.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases range and duration of your "Mental Pulse" by !e1%.
37.name: Gravikinesis
37.title: Gravikinesis

38.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Psychic "Shock"" and "Astral Venom" abilities apply a Shattered Nerves effect on a target which stacks up to 5 times and increases damage from the next application of Pain Transfer or "Destabilization" spell by !e1 per stack.
38.name: Shattered_Nerves
38.title: Shattered Nerves

39.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Psychic "Shock"" and "Astral Venom" abilities by !e1%.
39.name: Shocking_Strike
39.title: Shocking Strike

40.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases range of your "Telekinetic Pull" by !e1%.
All affected targets receive !e2 damage.
40.name: Telekinesis
40.title: Telekinesis

41.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases mana cost of your Mental Link, "Will Suppression" and "Telekinetic Pull" spells by !e1%.
Increases range of your Mental Link, "Will Suppression", Erase Memory, Mental Explosion and "Telekinetic Pull" spells by !e2 yards.
41.name: Easy_Reach
41.title: Easy Reach

42.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Pyrokinesis" and "Pyrolysis" spells by !e1%.
42.name: Pyromania
42.title: Pyromania

43.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the amount of the "Concentration" effects applied by your "Concentration" spell to 3.
43.name: Detachment
43.title: Detachment

44.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Pyrokinesis" and "Pyrolysis" abilities grant you a Pyrophrenia effect that lasts 20 seconds, stacks up to !e1 times and decreases cast time of "Pyrokinesis" and "Pyrolysis" by 0.
1 second per stack.
44.name: Pyrophrenia
44.title: Pyrophrenia

45.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldowns of your "Mental Pulse" and "Telekinetic Pull" abilities by !e1%.
45.name: Experienced_Manipulator
45.title: Experienced Manipulator

46.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Temporal Acceleration" ability by !e1%.
46.name: Chronokinesis
46.title: Chronokinesis

47.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cast time of your Mental Link spell by !e1%.
47.name: Extrasensory_Gift
47.title: Extrasensory Gift

48.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Willpower by !e1% and Stamina by !e2%.
48.name: Mental_Fortress
48.title: Mental Fortress

49.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of the Mental Link control effects by !e1%.
Increases damage of your "Will Suppression" spell by !e2%.
49.name: Cruel_Master
49.title: Cruel Master

50.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of your "Concentration" ability by !e1%.
50.name: Tranquillity
50.title: Tranquillity

53.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your physical damage and Fire damage dealt by !e1%.
53.name: Triumph_of_Reason
53.title: Triumph of Reason

54.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the critical strike chance of your "Choke", "Mental Pulse", Erase Memory and Mental Explosion spells by !e1% of your current critical strike chance.
54.name: Anger_Management
54.title: Anger Management

55.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBring you to a state of "Detachment" for 5 seconds, in which you will restore mana to full.
Any attack on you will cause 100% more damage and dispel this effect.
55.name: Superficial_Trance
55.title: Superficial Trance

56.body: !lvl !cost !dYour successful hits with the "Choke" spell apply an Outsmarted effect on the target which lasts 15 seconds, stacks up to 5 times and increases the damage from the next "Psychic "Shock"", "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis" or "Astral Venom" by !e1 per stack.
56.name: Outsmarted
56.title: Outsmarted

57.body: !lvl !cost !dYour Pain Transfer and "Destabilization" abilities apply the Moral Trauma effect on a target which inflicts !e1 damage every second for 6 seconds.
57.name: Moral_Trauma
57.title: Moral Trauma

58.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cast time and mana cost of your "Wall of Blades" ability by !e1%.
58.name: Stinging_Blades
58.title: Stinging Blades

59.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldown of your "Choke" ability to !e1 sec.
Increases the "Choke" slowdown effect to !e2%.
59.name: Solid_Grasp
59.title: Solid Grasp

60.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Mental Pulse" and "Telekinetic Pull" apply the Astral Curse effect on the target that lasts 15 seconds.
The next successful Astral attack on the same target will cause the effect to trigger, inflicting !e1 damage.
60.name: Astral_Curse
60.title: Astral Curse

61.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Agility by !e1% and Wisdom by !e2%.
61.name: Enthusiasm
61.title: Enthusiasm

62.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dTeleports you and your group to a safe place.
Casting this spell will not be interrupted by damage.
62.name: Exodus
62.title: Exodus

65.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Endurance by !e1% and Faith by !e2%.
65.name: Fighting_Foresight
65.title: Fighting Foresight

66.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen a "Temporal Acceleration" effect is active, all affected abilities consume 50% less mana.
66.name: Optimization
66.title: Optimization

67.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical strike chance of your "Wall of Blades", "Pyrokinesis", "Pyrolysis", "Psychic "Shock"" and "Astral Venom" spells by !e1%.
67.name: Clarity_of_Thought
67.title: Clarity of Thought

69.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical strike chance of your Pain Transfer and "Destabilization" spells, as well as critical strike chance of the Spectral Assassin blows, by !e1%.
69.name: Calculating_Mind
69.title: Calculating Mind

70.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your Pain Transfer and "Destabilization" abilities by !e1%.
70.name: Mental_Reign
70.title: Mental Reign

71.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSends you back in time 10 seconds, restoring your health, mana and position to their former state and dispelling all negative effects applied within the last 10 seconds.
71.name: Loop_of_Time
71.title: Loop of Time
